publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3019 Mr Keith Harding: Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews-That the Parliament commends the celebration of Scotland and Scottish and local history that takes place in the annual Kate Kennedy procession in St Andrews; applauds the men and women who took part in the April 2002 event, and trusts that the procession will continue to raise substantial funds for local charitable causes in Fife for many years to come.
S1M-3019 Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews (lodged on 23 April 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, Murdo Fraser*

S1M-3019 Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews (lodged on 23 April 2002) John Young*, Alex Fergusson*, John Scott*, David Mundell*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr David Davidson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, David McLetchie*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Johnstone*, Ben Wallace*

S1M-3019 Mr Keith Harding: Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews-That the Parliament commends the celebration of Scotland and Scottish and local history that takes place in the annual Kate Kennedy procession in St Andrews; applauds the men and women who took part in the April 2002 event, and trusts that the procession will continue to raise substantial funds for local charitable causes in Fife for many years to come. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Murdo Fraser, John Young, Alex Fergusson, John Scott, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Mr Murray Tosh, Bill Aitken, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, David McLetchie, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mary Scanlon, Alex Johnstone, Ben Wallace
